Chapter Previous Next

class gstRotateManipulator : public gstManipulator

Rotational manipulator. This uses the PHANToM to rotate a node, with force feedback. When active, the manipulator confines the PHANToM to a sphere around the object. The PHANToM also must exceed a threshold force before the manipulator allows the object to be moved. The force feedback is that of a simulated rotating mass with rotational damping.

From header file: gstRotateManipulator.h
